<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 21"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Jahan Waystone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=957)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 207 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This enormous stone glows with a pale light and emits a quiet hum. Each _Jahan waystone_ is part of a paired link. The paired stones correspond in the color of the light they emit, as well as the specific tone at which they hum.

<document level="2" id="action-735" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
